This apartment is in a wonderful location in Clinton Hill about two blocks away from the official border of Fort Greene. It is just a few blocks from tons of great bars and restaurants, and less than a ten-minute walk from Fort Greene park. It`s also about 1 mile from the Barclays Center and Atlantic Terminal, which has been a real perk for catching the LIRR or a Nets game. Grocery shopping can be had at any of the numerous grocery stores (one of which is an organic/natural-type grocery store) within a few blocks.
The apartment unit has relatively new appliances (probably about 3 or 4 years old), including a dishwasher. There is an elevator in the building and coin-op laundry units in the basement. As you can see from the pictures, it`s mostly all hardwood flooring. (Don`t be deceived by the pictures, though - the apartment is not furnished). In case it`s not apparent from the pictures, there are four windows in the apartment: 1 in the bedroom, 2 adjacent in the living room, and a small one in the bathroom.
Public Transportation: G train is 2 blocks away; C train is 4 and a half blocks away; BDQNR about 1 mile away. Buses all about.
In short, I think this location and apartment are wonderful. In fact, my fiancee and I love the apartment so much that we`re going to keep it, but we`ll sublet it to the right person/people. (One of us recently started an 18-months job that requires being out of town most of the time). We`re seeking to find a subtenant for September 1 and, ideally, renting out the unit for a 10 or 11-months term.
Viewing can be scheduled by appointment, so please email if interested.

postings.body:
Need a last minute getaway for the weekend? Looking for a unique place to stay for a few days? Want to escape Albany or NYC for a getaway vegging out in the great outdoors? Want to fish in your own private pond. Mad Duck Pond may be the place for you!
The Details:
A rustic log cabin located on 30-wooded acres in Marshville (4-miles outside of Canajoharie, NY). The cabin has one large bedroom in an upstairs loft (accessible via a spiral staircase) and a small guest bedroom downstairs as well as a full-size pull-out couch in the living room, to sleep a total of five adults. It also features modern stainless steel appliances, full clawfoot tub for soaking with showerhead if needed, wood stove and electric heat. Large deck with 4-burner propane barbecue range.
Has a large pond stocked with blue gill, rock bass, crappie, and other fish, also suitable for swimming & small boats in the warmer months.
The property is great for hunting, animal watching, and birding, with trails for hiking and 4x4/off-roading. Very dog friendly.
Long private drive for privacy. Parking for 4+ vehicles.
Available immediately for short or long-term rentals.
Rates: Vacation Rentals
 $100/weekday night
 $150/weekend night (Fri, Sat, Sun)
 Multi-night/extended stays
 Negotiable, make an offer
 Weekly Stay
 $750
 Monthly Stay
 $1750 + Utilities
 Please note: Firewood is provided at cost, please inquire if you`ll be using the wood stove.
Nearby places & attractions (within 30-minutes of the cabin):
Canajoharie - Arkell Museum, Picture Perfect Gallery, Price Chopper Grocery
Sharon Springs - American Hotel, Black Cat Café, Beekman Boys & 1802 Mercantile, Harvest Festival
Cooperstown - Baseball Hall of Fame, Glimmerglass Opera, Ommegang Brewery, Farmer`s Museum, James Fenimore Cooper Art Museum, Hyde Hall
Cherry Valley - great art scene, galleries, restaurants
Cobleskill - Howe Caverns, SUNY
Fort Plain - FP Museum, Historic Erie Canal locks

postings.body: If you looking for a comfortable, clean and quit place to stay in Asheville during your vacation or any other purpose - definitely my neighborhood as oldest, well established, safe and friendly part of the city is an excellent choice. My Traditional Contemporary House is conveniently located less then a mile from downtown, little over a mile to Mission Hospital and Biltmore Estate and is a perfect place to live in as well as a gateway to explore all surrounding attraction which Asheville has to offer. With easy freeway access, just a couple blocks to Interstate 40 and 240 and is an excellent starting point for longer field trips as well. This property features magnificent accommodations within easy reach of many diverse restaurant, local shopping and Asheville Mall. All above sounds like a very convenient place but this is not all. Like I mentioned in the beginning this is an older part of the city and surrounded by lot of trees; Lots of them and huge, so you feel like you`re in the park but still you can see mountains in the horizon above urban development. Perfect retreat after a long day of activities and excitement or just great place to relax and enjoy. This charming and cozy 2400 sf. house is completely renovated and remodeled, has very functional open concept floor plan, spacious bedrooms, excellent baths and great, well equipped kitchen. We provide high quality top grade linens and towels. Charter cable service TiVo, NETFLIX, 4 flat screen TV in bedrooms, fast speed internet and Wi-Fi, telephone with long distance calls, Desktop PC and printer is provided. Gazebo on deck, and fire Pit in fenced private yard. There are plenty of parking spaces for 8 or more cars on both driveways and in addition long car garage can be used as storage for bikes and motorcycles. Main floor include master suite with Queen size bed, full bathroom with Jacuzzi, large shower and walk in closet. Bedroom has a sliding door to deck in private fenced-in yard. Two other bedrooms, one with Queen size bed and another with two twin beds which share the second full bath. Dining/ living area is open to kitchen with bar and provide access to all bedrooms, linen closet, second bath, main entry, back yard deck and stair case to garage and apartment in lower level. Mother In-law apartment include kitchen/living area with bar, king size bed in bedroom with computer desk, full bathroom with Jacuzzi and walk in closet. It has separate entry door to street level driveway and garage.`

Beautiful, newly renovated and tastefully decorated home in quiet, friendly neighborhood in a beach community. The home has nearly 3,000 square feet with 4 bedrooms and 2 ½ baths and can comfortably sleep 10 in private rooms. There is a private swimming pool and a Pontoon boat that accommodates 12 and can be rented to go boating in the intra-coastal waterway for beaching, crabbing, fishing, catching great sunsets or just for plain fun! North Padre Island is less commercialized, where you can find peace and serenity. If you want a quick get-a-way, Port Aransas and Corpus Christi are a 15 minute drive away. Port Aransas is a more commercialized, deep sea fishing community and has many restaurants, specialty shops and Riverboat Gambling in the Gulf of Mexico. The National Seashore is only 5 miles away with approximately 70 miles of seashore and sand dunes with unparalleled serenity and beauty.

The house is regular sized with a bathroom and has a little bit of room available to cook and put some stuff in the refrigerator.
The place is located a few miles from CSULA and within a mile from the freeway, laundry, bus lines, etc.

Be clean
No criminals
THE ROOM IS FOR ONE PERSON, but you can have a guest over about once a week.
Lock the doors. Those are the main things.

postings.heading: SPACIOUS AptNext 2 TUFTS18 Mins 2 DAVIS SQUARENear TEELE2 BATHS

postings.body:
Available dates: any week in 2014 or 2015 (7 nights), need advance notice to confirm availability. $3,000/wk (7 nights) or best offer.
Check in: 4:00 pm, check out: 10:00 am. (Early check-in and late check-out available upon request.)
Plan ahead for a LUXURY tropical vacation like you`ve never experienced before! Extend your summer and relax in your own private villa with stunning views of the gorgeous Pacific ocean!
Expect the ultimate Cabo luxury family vacation when you book your stay at Montecristo Estates, Pueblo Bonito`s gorgeous all-inclusive villas in Cabo San Lucas. These stylish vacation rental villas are located on the Pacific side of tip of the Baja Peninsula, offering breathtaking views of the ocean and the surrounding landscape. Unwind in a luxurious 3-bedroom villa, complete with a private pool and Jacuzzi, a furnished terrace, a living room and TV room, a full kitchen and a laundry room. Enjoy a day at the Clubhouse or the Spas, spend a day on the private beach on the Pacific Ocean, or explore the sister Pueblo Bonito Resorts and dine at their award-winning restaurants.
Breathtaking 3 bedroom, 3.5 bath villa at the secure, gated Montecristo Estates on the tip of the magnificent Baja Peninsula in Cabo San Lucas, Mexico. 3,500+ sq. ft. villa sleeps up to 10 people and is great for couples looking for a private, romantic retreat or for larger groups of family and friends to enjoy together. This luxurious retreat embraces every possible comfort, including a full kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances, entertainment center with satellite TV, DVD, stereo and CD player, computer with high-speed internet and fax, laundry room with washer and dryer, and outdoor gas grill. All-inclusive plan available for an extra charge, but not required. Because you have your own chefs kitchen at your private villa, you may choose to do a combo of eating in and enjoying the resort`s many restaurants and bars ala carte instead of purchasing the optional all-inclusive food/beverage package, if you wish.
Other luxurious features include your own private infinity pool, indoor and outdoor jacuzzis, two large terraces, a central family room, reading areas, a hidden safe for valuables, and large walk-in closets. Daily maid service in the villa, fantastic and very friendly 24-hour concierge services, babysitting available, and you can even hire a personal chef to prepare a special meal for you and your guests if you want. There are on-site shuttle services and off-site round trip shuttle services from sister resorts Pueblo Bonito Sunset Beach, Pacifica, Rose, and Blanco Resorts, which will take you a few short blocks walk from fun and exciting downtown Cabo. Each villa has a carport for parking convenience if you choose to have your own car during your stay (but a car isn`t necessary to easily get around), and Avis offers preferred low rental rates on cars to Montecristo guests and has a convenient Avis location right on the grounds of the resort.
Spectacular golfing at the resort`s gorgeous new Jack Nicklaus course, Quivira Golf Club, offers more oceanfront play than any other course in Los Cabos. Also enjoy world-famous sport fishing in Cabo, the famous El Arco, Lover`s Beach, Sammy Hagar`s Cabo Wabo, and more. Access to the other four amazing Pueblo Bonito resorts, beautiful pools, world-class spas, and gourmet restaurants in the area at Sunset Beach, Pacifica, Rose, and Blanco. Any dining charges, spa treatments, or other purchases at the sister resorts can be directly added to your villa account at Montecristo for your convenience.
For more info and pictures of the stunning Montecristo Estates go to: http://www.pbmontecristoestates.com/
I have traveled all over the world, and this is by far the most beautiful, relaxing destination I have ever been to, hands down. With breathtaking panoramic views of the tranquil Pacific ocean, Montecristo Estates does not disappoint. Do not miss this once-in-a-lifetime gorgeous retreat!
Contact me by email reply with any further questions and travel dates of interest - I look forward to hearing from you.
